Discussions also covered sanctions against Russia, particularly restricting energy exports.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ukraine-russia-war-zelenskyy-dials-pm-modi-raises-issue-of-oil-trade-to-meet-in-person-soon/articleshow/123238276.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ukraine-russia-war-zelenskyy-dials-pm-modi-raises-issue-of-oil-trade-to-meet-in-person-soon/articleshow/123238276.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 18:49:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1309669" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123238414,imgsize-1309669.cms"/></item><item><title>'Have made it clear ... Munir warned of destroying Indian infrastructure affecting water flow and issued a broader nuclear threat. India asserts Pakistan's military dominance undermines democracy and raises concerns about nuclear weapons falling into the wrong hands.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/irresponsible-state-with-nuclear-weapons-govt-hits-out-at-pakistan-army-chief-asim-munirs-remarks-calls-it-part-of-pattern/articleshow/123232846.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/irresponsible-state-with-nuclear-weapons-govt-hits-out-at-pakistan-army-chief-asim-munirs-remarks-calls-it-part-of-pattern/articleshow/123232846.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 14:10:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="810557" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123233456,imgsize-810557.cms"/></item><item><title>Rohit Sharma buys the most expensive car of his life – price tag is just wild</title><description><![CDATA[Indian cricket star Rohit Sharma has acquired a striking red Lamborghini Urus SE, personalized with the number plate '3015'. Sharma's car collection also features other luxury vehicles like BMW and Mercedes-Benz models.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharmas-new-red-hot-lamborghini-urus-se-price-performance-and-features/articleshow/123239238.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharmas-new-red-hot-lamborghini-urus-se-price-performance-and-features/articleshow/123239238.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 20:04:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="76346" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123239328,imgsize-76346.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk replies to post on Donald Trump declaring 'emergency' in Washington DC over rising crime</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump declared on Truth Social that Washington, D.C., would be "LIBERATED" following a surge in crime, including the attack on a former employee of Elon Musk's DOGE. Musk responded to Trump's post and supported Stephen Miller's statement about the city's violence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/social/elon-musk-replies-to-post-on-donald-trump-declaring-emergency-in-washington-dc-over-rising-crime/articleshow/123240026.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/social/elon-musk-replies-to-post-on-donald-trump-declaring-emergency-in-washington-dc-over-rising-crime/articleshow/123240026.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 20:59:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="21466" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123240025,imgsize-21466.cms"/></item><item><title>Exclusive | Watching Magnus at 2: How 5-yo Aarini became India's No. 1 youngest talent</title><description><![CDATA[At just five, Delhi’s Aarini Lahoty is India’s highest-rated chess player in her age group, boasting a FIDE rating of 1551. Balancing studies, chess, and play, she dreams of becoming India’s youngest IM and GM.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/exclusive-watching-magnus-carlsen-at-2-how-5-year-old-aarini-lahoty-became-indias-no-1-among-youngest-chess-talents/articleshow/123236359.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/exclusive-watching-magnus-carlsen-at-2-how-5-year-old-aarini-lahoty-became-indias-no-1-among-youngest-chess-talents/articleshow/123236359.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:18:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JYOTIRMOY HALDER</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="80614" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236399,imgsize-80614.cms"/></item><item><title>SC order on Delhi stray dogs: Protests erupt in Capital, many detained</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi Police detained animal rights activists protesting at India Gate against the Supreme Court's order to relocate all stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters. GitHub Copilot, boasting over 20 million users, will be a key component of Microsoft's AI strategy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-resigns-ive-decided-to-leaveto-become-/articleshow/123240627.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-resigns-ive-decided-to-leaveto-become-/articleshow/123240627.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 21:50:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="700835" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123240611,imgsize-700835.cms"/></item><item><title>Woes deepen for Pakistan! India remains at the top of the rankings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/woes-deepen-for-pakistan-india-remain-no-1-in-latest-icc-odi-rankings-more-inside/articleshow/123239476.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/woes-deepen-for-pakistan-india-remain-no-1-in-latest-icc-odi-rankings-more-inside/articleshow/123239476.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 20:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="119228" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123239696,imgsize-119228.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump tariffs: Can Indian refiners do without Russian oil?</title><description><![CDATA[Kpler reports Indian refiners possess the technical capacity to operate without Russian crude, but this shift would entail significant economic and strategic disadvantages. This transition would also misalign product yields, making it a commercially challenging endeavor.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariffs-on-india-can-indian-refiners-do-without-russian-oil-major-economic-and-strategic-trade-offs-involved/articleshow/123235193.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-tariffs-on-india-can-indian-refiners-do-without-russian-oil-major-economic-and-strategic-trade-offs-involved/articleshow/123235193.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 16:24:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="226025" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123235591,imgsize-226025.cms"/></item><item><title>'Gill captaining in Duleep Trophy is a massive ... Two Bengal tiger cubs died within three days. This happened after a litter of six cubs was born. The mother, Aditi, is caring for the remaining four cubs. Zoo officials are monitoring them closely. Supplements are being given to Aditi. The zoo has a history of tiger breeding.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/delhi-2-of-6-tiger-cubs-born-last-week-in-zoo-die-4-under-close-watch/articleshow/123238233.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/delhi-2-of-6-tiger-cubs-born-last-week-in-zoo-die-4-under-close-watch/articleshow/123238233.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 18:41:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2188103" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123238259,imgsize-2188103.cms"/></item><item><title>CBSE revamps Legal Studies: Students to study triple talaq, Sec 377 & sedition law removal from 2026</title><description><![CDATA[The CBSE will revise its Legal Studies syllabus for Classes XI and XII to include key legal reforms such as the repeal of triple talaq, the sedition law, and Section 377. The updated curriculum will align with the Bhartiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), Bhartiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita (BNSS), and Bhartiya Sakshya Adhiniyam (BSA), replacing colonial-era laws. Implementation is scheduled for the 2026–27 academic session, with updated textbooks to be developed by an expert committee.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-legal-studies-syllabus-overhaul-students-to-study-triple-talaq-repeal-section-377-and-sedition-law-removal-from-2026/articleshow/123236213.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-legal-studies-syllabus-overhaul-students-to-study-triple-talaq-repeal-section-377-and-sedition-law-removal-from-2026/articleshow/123236213.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 17:38:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="186630" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123236188,imgsize-186630.cms"/></item><item><title>Air India to suspend nonstop Delhi-Washington flights from Sept 1</title><description><![CDATA[Air India will suspend its Delhi-Washington nonstop flights from September 1, 2025. The anti-doping bill addresses WADA's concerns, ensuring NADA's independence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/lok-sabha-passes-sports-bill-sports-minister-mansukh-mandaviya-calls-it-single-biggest-sports-reform-since-independence/articleshow/123234971.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/lok-sabha-passes-sports-bill-sports-minister-mansukh-mandaviya-calls-it-single-biggest-sports-reform-since-independence/articleshow/123234971.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 15:55:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PTI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43234" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123234995,imgsize-43234.cms"/></item><item><title>Kapil Sharma gets tight security from Mumbai Police after firing at his café in Canada</title><description><![CDATA[Following two shooting incidents outside Kapil Sharma's Canada café, Mumbai Police have heightened security for the comedian and his family. The increased protection comes after Salman Khan's appearance on 'The Great Indian Kapil Show,' reportedly drawing the ire of the Lawrence Bishnoi syndicate.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/kapil-sharma-gets-tight-security-from-mumbai-police-after-firing-at-his-caf-in-canada/articleshow/123237773.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/kapil-sharma-gets-tight-security-from-mumbai-police-after-firing-at-his-caf-in-canada/articleshow/123237773.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 18:11:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>etimes.in</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37644" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123237771,imgsize-37644.cms"/></item><item><title>Oppn MPs’ march to EC: Akhilesh jumps barricade; Rahul detained – Key points</title><description><![CDATA[Opposition leaders, including Rahul Gandhi and Mallikarjun Kharge, marched to the Election Commission to protest alleged voter fraud and irregularities in Bihar's electoral roll revision. Delhi Police halted the march, leading to dramatic scenes of leaders climbing barricades.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sir-row-high-drama-at-opposition-mps-march-to-ec-akhilesh-yadav-jumps-barricade-rahul-gandhi-detained-key-points/articleshow/123230765.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sir-row-high-drama-at-opposition-mps-march-to-ec-akhilesh-yadav-jumps-barricade-rahul-gandhi-detained-key-points/articleshow/123230765.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 12:31:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3965681" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123231392,imgsize-3965681.cms"/></item><item><title>Bite marks, beatings: Nanny who brutalised toddler had no training</title><description><![CDATA[In Noida, a 15-month-old baby was allegedly tortured at a daycare center by a 16-year-old attendant, who bit her thighs and inflicted other injuries. The parents discovered the abuse after noticing bite marks and viewing CCTV footage that revealed the extent of the violence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/noida-daycare-attendant-accused-of-biting-toddler-is-a-minor-herself/articleshow/123210609.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/noida-daycare-attendant-accused-of-biting-toddler-is-a-minor-herself/articleshow/123210609.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 05:19:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AVISHEK KUMAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12422" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123226867,imgsize-12422.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[SuperGaming raises $15 million to power global expansion into Latin America, Middle East]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/gaming-startup-supergaming-funding-ai-platform-global-expansion-19652183.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Pune-based SuperGaming has raised $15 million in Series B funding at a $100 million valuation to fuel global expansion, starting with Latin America and the Middle East. The company, which has over 200 million users across its portfolio, will also invest in talent, development capabilities, and its AI-powered Super Platform to deliver global-quality gaming experiences on local hardware.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[IHCL to acquire 51% stake each in ANK Hotels and Pride Hospitality for ₹204 crore]]></title>

      <description><![CDATA[“By combining Meta AI with WhatsApp, Meta appears capable of channelling its customer base into the emerging market, not through merit-based competition, but by “imposing” the availability of the two distinct services upon users, potentially harming competitors,” the Italian authority said.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Thu, 31 Jul 2025 12:53:26 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Vipal Durge</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/technology/italy-competition-authority-raids-meta-over-ai-in-whatsapp-abuse-probe-19646558.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2023/07/Meta.jpg"/>
    </item>
